name: io.github.msaid/autoplans-mcp
description: MCP Server for Autoplans.dev - AI-powered project planning and task management tools with 14+ tools for projects, tasks, business plans, and branding

environment_variables.name: AUTOPLANS_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for Autoplans.dev service. Get yours at https://autoplans.dev

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all projects for the authenticated user with optional filtering by status and limit

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create a new project with name, description, and optional GitHub repository URL

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific project by UUID

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task in a project with title, description, priority, and type

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List all tasks in a project with optional status filtering

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific task including subtasks

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update task properties like status, priority, title, description, or assignment

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Delete a task from a project permanently

tools.name: bulk_update_tasks
tools.description: Update multiple tasks at once (e.g., change status for multiple tasks)

tools.name: bulk_create_tasks
tools.description: Create multiple tasks at once from an array of task objects

tools.name: get_business_plan
tools.description: Get business plan for a project including mission, vision, and strategy

tools.name: create_business_plan
tools.description: Create a comprehensive business plan for a project

tools.name: get_branding
tools.description: Get branding information for a project including colors, logos, and brand identity

tools.name: create_branding
tools.description: Create branding for a project with colors, logos, and brand identity
